My Projects

A showcase of my work and technical skills

Tasky

A comprehensive task management platform with real-time chat that connects job posters with workers. Features include drag-and-drop task organization, priority setting, and robust admin controls for user management.

React.jsSpring BootMySQLWebSocketGoogle APIJWTZustandWebsocket
Source Code

CV-AI-Builder

An AI-powered resume builder that generates professional CVs with intelligent formatting and content suggestions.

Next.jsTypeScriptShadCN/UIWebhooksPrismaClerkPostgreSQLVercel BlobStripeOpenAI APITailwindcss
Source Code

Scrape And Compare Coles, Woolworths, Aldi Price

A website that scrapes and compares prices from Coles, Woolworths, and Aldi with interactive charts for easier comparison. Products are stored in a database to track price history over time.

Three.jsPuppeteerMongoDBReChartTailwindcss
Source Code

About Me

Hello! I am a passionate fullstack developer on the verge of graduating with a fresh perspective and enthusiasm for technology. I have developed a strong foundation in both frontend and backend technologies through my coursework and personal projects, allowing me to create complete web solutions from concept to deployment.

As I transition from student to professional, I am excited to apply my skills in a real-world environment. I thrive on solving complex problems and enjoy the process of learning new technologies. What drives me most is creating applications that are not just functional but also deliver meaningful experiences to users.

Problem SolverCreative ThinkerContinuous Learner
